portfolio_context.constraints_note: Technology exposure at ~33%, Industrials and Materials elevated but below 45% cap. New tech additions allowed cautiously.

candidates.name: Wheaton Precious Metals
candidates.catalyst: Earnings estimates revised upward and strong Zacks Momentum Score A
candidates.fundamentals: Consensus earnings up 8.8% over last 60 days
candidates.rationale: Non-tech diversification candidate with solid momentum and improving earnings outlook. Materials exposure still below sector cap.
candidates.recommendation: Good candidate for 8–10% weight if adding Materials exposure.

candidates.name: NVIDIA Corp.
candidates.catalyst: Earnings estimates revised upward, strong AI-driven growth
candidates.rationale: Fits AI theme. Tech exposure currently manageable. Exceptionally strong fundamentals and momentum.
candidates.recommendation: Top-tier tech candidate. Consider if rotating into stronger tech names.

candidates.name: Lam Research Corp.
candidates.relative_strength: Strong relative strength percentile per Validea
candidates.rationale: Another AI/semicap beneficiary. Adds depth to tech without breaching sector caps.
candidates.recommendation: Strong candidate for 8–10% weight during tech rotation.

candidates.name: Agnico Eagle Mines
candidates.catalyst: Strong twelve-minus-one return [Best Momentum Stocks to Buy for Nov. 25 - FINVIZ.com](https://finviz.com/news/238779/best-momentum-stocks-to-buy-for-nov-25)(84.5%)
candidates.fundamentals: Solid gold volume and stable margins
candidates.rationale: Materials diversification with strong momentum profile. Does not breach sector limits.

candidates.name: Argan Inc.
candidates.fundamentals: Beneficiary of infrastructure and energy buildout demand
candidates.rationale: Strong industrial momentum name. Fits portfolio’s underweight cyclicals.
candidates.recommendation: Strong industrial candidate for diversification at 8–10% weight.

screening_summary.notes: All candidates meet liquidity and market cap thresholds. Technology exposure manageable at current levels.
